column5: at Phnom Penh International Airport  18 Chinese nationals were deported.------The 18 Chinese nationals were arrested on September 8
column9: said the Immigration Police.  They will be prohibited from the returning to the Kingdom of Cambodia for 3 years.------Special Flight CZ5246 took them back to China
column10: with officers from The Ministry of Public Security of the People’s Republic of China. ------POST NEWS
